document_data.name: ''Runic Blade of Aaqa''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Runic blades of Aaqa''''' were enchanted ceremonial [[dagger]]s wielded by the [[aarakocra]]s of [[Kir Sabal]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Powers: These ''runic blades'' were commonly used in [[ritual]]s to appease the [[Wind Dukes of Aaqa]] or quell their wrath. When wielded in battle, these daggers held enchantments that enhanced the wielder's natural and magical abilities.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Asharra]]: the aarakocra [[wizard]] leader of Kir Sabal in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
